en-GB.subject: Sign in to PSLifestyle
en-GB.greeting: Hey there! Click the link below to sign in to PSLifestyle
en-GB.signInPersistence: You'll stay logged in until your session expires, you log out or clear your browser cache.
en-GB.info_1: If this is your first time signing in, you have just created an account for yourself and you are able to save your responses.
en-GB.info_2: If you sign out, just enter your email on the website and we'll send you a link just like this one to sign in.
en-GB.info_3: If you are a returning user, welcome back! Let's change the world together.
